entries.description: Amazon Q CodeTransform may fail if JAVA_HOME has leading or trailing whitespace
Amazon Q FeatureDev: code generation may fail with "conversation id not found" error
Amazon Q Code Transformation: show error messages in chat
Amazon Q Code Transformation - Omit Maven metadata files when uploading dependencies to fix certain build failures in backend.
Enable Amazon Q feature development and Amazon Q transform capabilities (/dev and /transform) for AWS Builder ID users.
